mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM brandinfo WHERE brandCode IN
(#{item})

update.foreach:
update brandinfo
entId = #{item.entId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
brandName = #{item.brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandSCode = #{item.brandSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandCode = #{item.brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandTypeCode = #{item.brandTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandLevelCode = #{item.brandLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandEnName = #{item.brandEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
designer = #{item.designer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandDesc = #{item.brandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erpCode = #{item.erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erpName = #{item.erpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lang = #{item.lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{item.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateDate = #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
brandOriginCountryCode = #{item.brandOriginCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealType = #{item.dealType,jdbcType=CHAR},
seqNum = #{item.seqNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where brandCode = #{item.brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and erpCode=#{item.erpCode} and entId=#{item.entId}
and #{item.seqNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} >= seqNum

mapper.update:
update brandinfo
entId = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
brandName = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandSCode = #{brandSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandCode = #{brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandTypeCode = #{brandTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandLevelCode = #{brandLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandEnName = #{brandEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
designer = #{designer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandDesc = #{brandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erpName = #{erpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
brandOriginCountryCode = #{brandOriginCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealType = #{dealType,jdbcType=CHAR},
seqNum = #{seqNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where brandCode = #{brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and erpCode=#{erpCode} and entId=#{entId}
and #{seqNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} >= seqNum
